decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - (a) Any advertisement displayed and any site used for the display of advertisements shall be retained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the local planning authority. 
(b) Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition. 
(c) Where an advertisement is required under these Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisement) (England) Regulations 2007 to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the local planning authority. 
(d) No advertisement shall be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission. 
(e) No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure or hinder the ready interpretation of any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway or aerodrome (civil or military).
Reason: To comply with Regulation 14(1) and Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisement) (England) Regulations 2007 and to comply with paragraph 132 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2021.
Condition : 2 - INFORMATIVE: The footway and carriageway on the A3 Roehampton Vale must not be blocked during installation of the advertisement. Temporary obstructions during the works must be kept to a minimum and should not encroach on the clear space needed to provide safe passage for pedestrians or obstruct the flow of traffic on the A3 Roehampton Vale. All vehicles associated with the works must only park/stop at permitted locations and within the time periods permitted by existing on-street restrictions. No skips or construction materials shall be kept on the footway or carriageway on the TLRN at any time. 


Condition : 3 - INFORMATIVE: If the nature and size of the proposed advertisement is altered, then this will be subject to further consultation with Transport for London (TfL).
description: Display of non-illuminated advertisement billboard measuring 6396mm wide x 3348mm high and 150mm deep.
